fields.description:
Alert dialogue messages with large amounts of text automatically have the ability to scroll when an app is being run on iOS 7 and below. Since the release of iOS 8 and the new SDK the view no longer scrolls.

Mobile SDK 3.4.0 GA
iOS 8.0
Device iPhone (4,5,6,6+) iPad (retina, 2)
fields.summary: Alert Dialog message does not scroll on iOS 8 devices
